content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's great to meet you! I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. Let's discuss the price and make sure it's fair for both parties. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 500 euros per month. I am a student and I want to keep my rent as low as possible.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Oh, 500 euros is quite a low offer, Max. The location of this apartment is prime, and it's brand new. I'm sure you'll find it very comfortable. Are you willing to negotiate a higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can pay 550 euros per month. But I think this is a fair price for a student like me.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 550 euros is better, but still not reflecting the value of this apartment. It's a great opportunity for you to live in the city center, close to all amenities. Are you sure you can't afford a little bit more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can pay 575 euros, but I think this is a fair price considering the size of the apartment and my student status.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, you're a smart negotiator. 575 euros is closer to what I'm looking for. However, I think with your student status, you might be able to afford a bit more. How about 600 euros? It's a nice round number and a fair price for both sides. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 600 euros is a good price. I agree to the price of 600 euros per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The apartment will be perfect for you, and the location is unbeatable. Thank you for choosing my apartment, Max. We'll get the paperwork started soon. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
